item.title: My favorite VSCode Extension
item.description: ðŸ›ˆ This is not an ad. I just like this extension. My favorite VSCode extension is VSpaceCode. It is the closest thing to make VSCode more like Emacs and evil-mode. It has Which Key, which will, show you what key to press in its menu (which you call with space while in NORMAL mode) to do a certain action. It also has a Magit Clone, which Magit is the best keyboard based Git Manager.
